settings.scripts_manager.warn.title: Warning
settings.scripts_manager.warn.message:
Warning: Script Security Risk!

You are about to open the Script Manager. Please note that scripts are code written by third parties and may contain malicious logic.

For your safety:

  • Only download and run scripts from trusted sources.
  • Carefully read the script's permission requests.
  • If you are unsure about the safety of a script, do not enable it.
  • You can try uploading the script to AI platforms, virus detection centers, or seek assistance for identification.

    • Click 'Confirm' to continue opening the Script Manager.
settings.scripts_manager.warn.checkbox: Do not show this window again
settings.default_mmc_storage_path.toolti: This path is the default folder for saving/loading macros. Enabling this will disable the cache path memory function.
settings.enable_quick_mode.tooltip: In this mode, MouseMacros will only replay mouse and keyboard actions in the order they occurred, ignoring all pauses in between.
settings.allow_long_str.tooltip: When enabled, MouseMacros will try to display long tooltips in one line without wrapping.
settings.readjust_frame_mode.tooltip:
This option affects how MouseMacros handles 'historical window size (c)' and 'recommended window size (p)' after changing language settings.
MIXED is a mixed mode, taking the larger of c and p to calculate the minimum 3:2 window size.
STANDARDIZED is a standard mode, only using p to calculate the minimum 3:2 window size.
MEMORIZED is a memory mode, directly using 'historical window size (c)'.
settings.repeat_delay.tooltip: The waiting time required for the next repeat execution, supports up to three decimal places (milliseconds).
about_author.content:
Hello, I am Samera2022, the author of MouseMacros. First of all, thank you very much for using this program, and I would like to extend my warmest welcome to you.
    You can find me via Reddit: u/Samera2026 / Discord: FxVsujQsnC to report various usage problems. Of course, chatting is also welcome! However, for reporting usage problems, it is recommended to submit Issues on Github so that I can see them more timely.
    Oh, I haven't introduced the Github address of this project yet! But surely smart you have already guessed that this project should be Samera2022/MouseMacros. That's right! The address of this project is https://github.com/Samera2022/MouseMacros. If it helps you, please don't be stingy with your star!

script.version_mismatch.earlier: Current MouseMacros version %s is older than the required %s. This may cause compatible issue.

script.tooltip.mmc_vnc.earlier: Current MouseMacros version is too low (%s), not compatible with required version (%s).
script.tooltip.mmc_vnc.later: Current MouseMacros version is too high (%s), not compatible with required version (%s).
script.tooltip.hd_vnc.earlier: Hard dependency script (%s) version is too low (%s), not compatible with required version (%s).
script.tooltip.hd_vnc.later: Hard dependency script (%s) version is too high (%s), not compatible with required version (%s).
script.tooltip.hd_missing: Missing hard dependency script (%s), some features may not be available.
script.tooltip.hd_p.s: The %s dependency of this script has a serious problem, please check!
script.tooltip.hd_p.ns: The %s dependency of this script has a problem, please check!
script.native_access.title: Permission Request - %s
script.native_access.message:
Warning: Script Requests Advanced Permissions!

The script '%s' (%s) requests Native Access Permission, which allows it to perform operations outside the scope of regular scripts.

Please only enable this script if you fully trust the script author and the script content.

If you cannot determine the safety of this script, please try uploading the script to AI platforms, virus detection centers, or seek assistance for identification.

Potential risks include:

  • Reading, modifying, or deleting files on your computer.
  • Executing arbitrary system commands.
  • Interacting with other programs.
  • Connecting to the internet to download or upload data.

Explanation provided by the author:

%s

Are you sure you want to enable this script and grant it native access permissions?
log.macro_not_recording: Macro is not being recorded currently
